column1: Congrats @TennesseeCheer! https://t.co/D5HUmNJbQJ

Today @VW opened its first US-based Innovation Hub right here in Knoxville. In partnership with @UTKnoxville and @ORNL this facility will develop cutting-edge technologies and conduct world-class research. Congrats to everyone who made this project a reality. https://t.co/NAuw7XwHTS

Charlie Hamilton’s military service medals were stolen a while back. His son Jeff reached out to our office to see if we could help. Today surrounded by his family Charlie got his replacement medals including the Purple Heart. Thank you Charlie for your service and sacrifice. https://t.co/pzlNxw9kI5

Honored to receive the Tennessee Alzheimer's Leader Award from the @alzassociation. Looking forward to continuing to fight for those living with this difficult illness. #ENDALZ https://t.co/ZdVlsw8efr

Religious freedom and liberty are basic rights that must be afforded to every American. While serving as a Tennessee state legislator and county mayor I upheld my constituents’ rights to worship freely. I will always stand for these values as TN-02's representative in Congress. https://t.co/fP0DDPG9cr

The Phase One trade agreement boosts exports of American goods and services to China and levels the playing field for American companies looking to do business in China. Thank you @realDonaldTrump and @USTradeRep for standing up to China and creating fairer trade for America!

We now pause House business once again to vote on the "urgent" 28 day old partisan impeachment articles. Meanwhile we will not vote to stand up for the Iranian protesters basic right to free speech.   This Democrat majority's priorities are completely out of touch.
I will be joining @OKnox on Sirius XM channel 124 at 6:40pm to discuss the situation in Iran.

Why in the world are @HouseDemocrats blocking the @GOPLeader's resolution condemning this Iranian regime for obvious human rights violations? This isn't complicated. Let's stand up for the same basic right to free speech in Iran that we have here and vote on this resolution.
My local team is at Townsend City Hall staffing Mobile Office Hours now until 2 p.m. Stop by for help with federal agency issues or to pass on an opinion. https://t.co/PvHkNQWx4k
Will @SpeakerPelosi actually send the “urgent” Articles of Impeachment to the Senate next week and start the trial against @realDonaldTrump? Who knows...🤷‍♂️  https://t.co/FusphMXHws

I voted against the Iranian war powers resolution before the House today. This resolution lacks definitive action to influence our military's actions in Iran and normalizes the brutal crimes of General Soleimani. You can read my full statement on this vote below. https://t.co/4vdIDdRLM2

Earlier today the House passed the Prison to Proprietorship for Formerly Incarcerated Act legislation I authored along with @RepJeffries. This bill is very important for helping formerly incarcerated individuals reenter the workforce. Read more here: https://t.co/eVL3adv4C2
Joining @toddstarnes live in-studio to discuss news of the day. Tune in at https://t.co/DJMJ107n0I! https://t.co/T1GktQRdoF

I’m relieved no Americans were harmed during the Iranian missile strikes last night. We must avoid war with Iran and deescalate tensions in the region. Let’s bring our brave men and women in Iraq back home.
Praying for our troops in Iraq tonight. Read my full statement on the developing situation in Iraq below. https://t.co/hnUUW36L2d

Congratulations to Jovita Carranza on her confirmation to lead the Small Business Administration! I look forward to working with Administrator Carranza as the House Small Business Committee continues to grow and strengthen America’s small businesses. @SBAgov
My 2020 issues survey is now available on my official website! I want to hear about what issues are most important to you. Please take a moment to complete the survey! https://t.co/NS5V3SHQ95
I’m live in studio until noon with @BobYarbrough @987news https://t.co/zlrfxfX7Cx

It was an honor to present Eden Carnes the Silver Congressional Award today at the Blount County Courthouse. Not only did Eden take the initiative to apply for this program but she set her own goals and saw them through. This award isn’t given it’s earned. Congrats! #earnedit https://t.co/v9PwGoMNyw

I am saddened to hear my friend @DrPhilRoe is retiring from Congress at the end of this year. He has been an excellent mentor and I will miss serving alongside him in Congress! https://t.co/ujCmcgLzOQ https://t.co/Kjz0TFcxWd
Today marks one year since I was sworn into Congress and I’m happy to share some of my accomplishments. It’s an honor and privilege to serve Tennessee's Second District. https://t.co/3MsSmMxPi7
The message is clear: any hostility toward Americans will not be tolerated. (2/2)

The U.S. has the right to defend itself from any threat. Iran and its puppets put American lives at risk when our embassy was attacked in Iraq. Today @POTUS @RealDonaldTrump and our military took appropriate action against Iran and its terrorist general Qassem Soleimani. (1/2)

My local team will staff Mobile Office Hours in Friendsville Townsend and Dandridge this month making it easier to get federal agency assistance and pass on your opinions. You do not need an appointment. https://t.co/CIixystZsB
Happy New Year! It’s been an honor to serve you in Congress this past year. I wish you and your family health and happiness as we enter a new decade. https://t.co/O5n7VsyrZy

I’m live in studio with Jim Brogan who’s hosting the Hallerin Hilton Hill Show this afternoon. We’re discussing my first year in Congress and recent legislation including the RAFT Act and Patriotic Employer Protection Act. https://t.co/FLynVrvZn0

Guest hosting the Hallerin Hilton Hill Show on NewsTalk 98.7. Appreciate  @rep_stevewomack Ranking Member of the @housebudgetGOP joining me on air to discuss the need for a responsible budget. https://t.co/kHuhFsf0x9

It was my honor to recognize Petty Officer First Class H. Travis Parker as Tennessee Second District's December Veteran on the Month! Thank you to all the veterans who bravely defend our country! https://t.co/B5OvkiLD7z
Wishing you and your family a very Merry Christmas! https://t.co/rRnNtPdXoZ

Legislation I co-authored the Patriotic Employer Protection Act was included in the National Defense Authorization Act signed into law by President Trump.  I'm proud of this bill that assists military reservists and their employers.  Read more below 🔽  https://t.co/2tmK97EInN

ICYMI: I recognized Dr. Pam Mobley during my remarks on the House floor yesterday afternoon. Since September Dr. Mobley has been in the Bahamas assisting with relief efforts in the aftermath of Hurricane Dorian. Thank you Pam for your selfless efforts to help others! https://t.co/zFuPfgx7YU

Today I was proud to vote in favor of #USMCA. This is a huge win for the employers and workers who have been ripped off by the original NAFTA for years. USMCA will boost Tennessee's exports to Canada and Mexico allowing our economy to continue to thrive. https://t.co/AL8pbyYP4U

This impeachment has been a sham based on hearsay and distracted Congress from the issues our constituents sent us here to address. We've wasted time money and resources on this irresponsible political stunt that will only divide our nation. I will vote no on impeachment. https://t.co/2Z4VaOM5iQ

I am about to wrap up my first year in Congress and I am disappointed to say we did not pass a single budget or responsible government spending bill in 2019. American taxpayers are not Congress’s piggy bank but the spending bills before the House today sure treat them like one. https://t.co/kzUnm2vzLe

Enjoyed visiting @StrataG today. For both its engineering services and focus on community service the company has received numerous awards including the @USChamber’s 2019 Dream Big Small Business of the Year Award. Join me in congratulating the Strata-G team on this recognition! https://t.co/EOR5PGB0tj

While I was sad to hear the news of Sue's passing I'm comforted knowing she'll get to spend this Christmas in Heaven reunited with Ben. The Atchleys were dear friends and mentors who served our state and our community selflessly. They are in my prayers. https://t.co/X5NqPWC5V0

ICYMI: I was proud to vote in favor of the National Defense Authorization Act last night. Our brave military members deserve the best equipment and technology as they defend our nation and citizens. https://t.co/W6pJyP5MSa
No person should be targeted for their religious beliefs. I support @realDonaldTrump's executive order to combat anti-Semitism in America. Hate is hate and it has no place in our country.

💼266000 jobs added  ✅Unemployment rate at 3.5% tying a 50-year low  ⬆️Wages up 3.1% over the past year   Just some of the excellent numbers from the November jobs report. Our economy remains strong delivering results for Americans!  https://t.co/QxflYwLPfv

Thank you to Sheriff James Berrong for leading the Blount County Sheriff's Office for 30 years. Blount County continues to be a safe place to live and raise a family under his leadership. Check out my remarks on the House floor honoring Sheriff Berrong for his service. https://t.co/YIgYviBw9r

Jack Harrison of Halls has been missing since November 17th. Local law enforcement and volunteers have been tirelessly searching to bring him back to safety since his disappearance. Please keep him in mind as you go about your day. https://t.co/hOZnJaCVA3
Robocall scams have tried to rip off East Tennesseans for too long. Today I voted for the TRACED Act legislation that holds robocall scammers accountable. https://t.co/wrYy1wiK3O
Met with Georgian Ambassador @BakradzeDavid earlier today. Great meeting thank you for stopping by Mister Ambassador! https://t.co/ouBJlXnjxX

Another week in Congress another week spent by @HouseDemocrats on their impeachment pet project. Meanwhile Congress ignores issues like:  ❌Passing the USMCA  ❌Securing our southern border ❌Controlling wasteful government spending  Let’s get back to work for our constituents.

November is Alzheimer's Awareness Month and I spoke on the House floor about this difficult illness. Millions of Americans live with Alzheimer's and this disease has impacted many individuals close to me. Those living with Alzheimer's must know they are not alone in their fight. https://t.co/EuarfaW83S

The Prison to Proprietorship for Formerly Incarcerated Act gives former inmates a second chance at success through small business ownership and entrepreneurship. Great to work with @RepJeffries and I spoke about the bill during a Small Business Committee hearing today. https://t.co/J1JpSfU7T6

188973 people voted for @realDonaldTrump in TN02. That is 188973 Tennessee voices House Democrats are trying to silence during this impeachment sham. This is wrong and I will continue to speak up on behalf of my constituents. #TNSpeaksUp https://t.co/V0btmCzsBk

I will speak up for my constituents in Tennessee who have had enough of this impeachment charade and want Congress to actually help improve their lives. #TNSpeaksUp @DesJarlaisTN04 @RepChuck @RepJohnRose @RepMarkGreen @DrPhilRoe @RepDavidKustoff https://t.co/yfoGtWJ1iz

Praying for our friends in Israel tonight. The Palestinian Islamic Jihad a radical terrorist organization in the Gaza Strip has been launching missiles into Israel over the last few days. I fully support Israel’s right to defend itself against terrorism.

It takes courage to enlist in the Guard or Reserves as so many in East Tennessee do and these service members deserve equal access to jobs. My bill ensures small businesses have access to financial support if an employee answers the call of duty. https://t.co/mXNa1sO9HE

These partisan impeachment hearings will consume the House for the next few weeks. Meanwhile we still need to:   - Secure the southern border - Pass the USMCA - Approve fiscally responsible appropriations bills   Congress is failing Americans by choosing theatrics over them.
